title: Great location + food tour
desc: The hotel has a great locations because is very close to the MRT and some hawker centers. Food tour on Sunday was a pleasant surprise which covered many different food types and was led by great tour guides!

title: The Dorsett hotel is fantastic
desc: The foodie tour organised by Dorsett hotel is really fantastic. The restaurants are amazing and food are delicious. The staff are sincere and thanks to hardworking in such hot weather. The Dorsett hotel deserves going again

title: Disappointing
desc: The first room I was given was dirty, damp and mouldy. But reception didn‚Äôt argue when I asked for another room. However, even the new room was dated and tatty. This hotel needs a refurb. The facilities are basic and lacking, with little in the way of catering - there are vending machines in reception but as they only take cash, they‚Äôre of no use to tourists. I won‚Äôt return.

title: Friendly and very accomodating staff
desc: I had an exceptional stay at Dorsett Singapore Hotel, largely due to the remarkable front desk staff member, Rowell. His friendly demeanor, accommodating attitude, and helpful nature truly stood out. His personalized assistance added an extra layer of comfort to my experience, making me feel welcome from the moment I arrived. Rowell's dedication to ensuring a pleasant stay truly made a difference and left a lasting positive impression on me.

title: Filthy, disgusting, and worn down.
desc: This place is a DUMP. Its big but everything is old and tacky (and not in a cute kitsch way). Most importantly though, its FILTHY. The hallways/elevator? Filthy stained carpets covered in trash and food particles and clumps of dust. Then we got to our room! First off, its much tinier than expected. But what hit us first was the solid wall of hot, stuffy, stale air. The A/C was off and our room was a stifling 26 degrees celsius. We discovered you could only turn on the air by inserting your room key. No matter though - even running all night set to 17 degrees it never got below 21. Next up, all the furniture is dinged, chipped, worn down, and rickety. Everything is painted baby poo greenish-brown. The safe? Broken. The carpet surrounding the closet? Stained from yellowish

title: Excellent service and hospitality
desc: Awesome staff, awesome hospitality. Right in the heart of Singapore surrounded by everything you need. Definitely recommend for your vacation. We joined the food tour and it is the best ever tour you will experience.

title: Dorsett Hotel complimentary local food tour
desc: Well organized food tour with lots of information on the local delicacy. Very enjoyable and fun. The hotel tour lead is well versed in the subject matter and articulate the points very well. As it a walking tour it fun to eat and walk

title: Warmth Service in Dorsett
desc: This is my third stay in Dorsett, always have a pleasant experience and warmth service for the receptionist, especially Mr. Roswell, philipino gentleman with excellent english speaking helps me a lot during my stay in Dorsett.

title: Coming back for more!
desc: The staff is very hospitable and friendly! We flew in guests from the Philippines, and Dorsett made sure that our guests were warmly welcomed and comfortable. They made sure all of our requests were accommodated. Will definitely come back!

title: Foodie walk
desc: A great experience able to tryreal local food in authentic food stalls and restaurants. The hotel staff were so friendly and accommodating informing us of the culture behind the food styles and customs. Eat like the locals in historical China Town

title: Fantastic Foodie Tour
desc: 1) The 3 guides were friendly, knowledgeable and personable!!! 2) The content of the tour was varied, comprehensive & engaging... 3) At the first and second stops, we had food wastage!! Pls arrange with the 2 repective restaurants to make tasting portions that are much smaller than what were served!

title: Recommend!
desc: Stayed here for 3 nights whilst on a city tour of Singapore before flying out to Bali. The hotel was nice, clean and in a convenient location, right next to Outram Park MRT which goes to most locations and just up the the road from China town. The breakfast was good, although slightly limited options, the bed was comfortable and we had a spacious, clean bathroom/shower. We very much used this hotel as ‚Äòbed and breakfast‚Äô as we were out all day and evening on all three days. The hotel doesn‚Äôt offer room service which was a little disappointing seeing as we arrived at 11.00pm and needed food. We had to resort to downloading the grab app and finding a fast food takeaway that delivers to get us through the night. Places of recommendation: Gardens by the Bay, Merlion Park.

title: Excellent location and wonderful staff
desc: We really enjoyed our stay at Dorsett. This was actually our third time at Dorsett Singapore and they've been consistently good. We love the location right above Outram Park MRT and the dedicated Dorsett lift is extra convenient. We booked two rooms and the Dorsett team was able to give us rooms right next each other just steps from the rooftop pool. Special thanks to Anthea and Rowell for being so welcoming and making check-in a breeze even when we were tired and jetlagged.

title: Clean rooms and top notch service
desc: Staying in dorsett Singapore was a very good experience. I had preferred staying in Chinatown previously. The rooms are very clean, towels were fluffy and bed was comfortable. Housekeeping and front office staff were very friendly and helpful. Will definitely come back again

title: Must-try foodies tour
desc: Pui Ling, Steven and Ken were really accommodating and knowledgeable as they brought us to the best food places around Tanjong Pagar and Chinatown, including those that Singaporeans like myself have never been to. The food tour is great for locals and tourists alike, as we tried a variety of local cuisines until our bellies and hearts were full. Definitely would recommend this experience! Bonus pic of our guide Pui Ling taking care of my niece so that my family could eat :)

title: Superb experience while in Dorsett Singapore
desc: Stayed for 3 nights. Hotel reception customers service is superb. Room and facilities clean and nice. Love the unique room door bell. Dorsett hotel location is great. Only few minutes walking distance to metro station which only 3 stops to Orchard and couple stops to Sentosa. Plus also few minutes walk to Chinatown, Chinatown huge food court and heaps of restaurants and cafes near by too. Too many options and choices to eat. While I was there, they have this Foodie Tour which held every Sunday from 10.30am till 1pm max 12 persons only with 2 tour guide. Managed to sign up in time and I got to try some of Singapore local foods and drinks. Plus it is all FREE by Dorsett Singapore. Was told this initiative started 3 months ago. What a great way to try local delicacies.

title: Fabulous foodie tour
desc: This food tour was amazing! Our guides lead us through China town to 5 various restaurants where we were given full meals. Not only were we able to get a feel of the area and see sights but we were able to try a variety of local cultural cuisine. All were delicious! And I highly recommend doing it!!

title: The food tour on sundays was well worth the time and most of all it's FREE
desc: The complimentary tour was quite fun. The guides were also very accommodating & very knowledgeable about the local culture. The rooms were clean as well. I don't know what to say anymore but there's a 200 character minimum so there...

title: Foodie Tour
desc: Two excellent tour hosts, Jenny and Adrian ! The tour is very easy going, friendly and filling ! Remember not to have your breakfast cause you would be introduced to several types of SG food. It‚Äôs lovely to have met other people in the group as well ! Making new friends along the way and exchanging views

title: Awesome hotel!
desc: Great location, close to Chinatown. Also close to a lot of the nice restaurants and bars. The beds are comfy and spacious, gym and pool also great amenities. There is also a free food tour conducted every Sunday by Dorsett which will leave your bellies full! Thanks for making our stay at SG a great experience!

title: Unhelpful staff and horrible rooms
desc: This was an awful experience for our family as we began our long awaited 6 week holiday. We booked for 2 adults and 3 children. In the booking we clearly stated the age of the children. We requested two rooms as each room could only fit 2 adults and 1 child. When we arrived we had 2 rooms with 2 single beds. So one of our children had no bed. When we spoke to reception we showed them all the communication we had with them, yet they still said we had booked the incorrect room type and that there were no other rooms for us. They said the next day we may be able to move one of the rooms at an extra cost- e do o any time so this as we would be staying on different floors plus we had only budgeted for the rooms we had booked. The staff were not very kind, helpful or accommodating

title: Not even a hello and welcome to the Dorsett
desc: We arrived around 10pm and as there were no staff in sight my husband managed our family of five luggage himself into the hotel - a female guest noticed him struggling with the trolley and assisted. I approached the front desk to check us in but was not welcomed, I wasn‚Äôt spoken to at all - I didn‚Äôt receive even a hello. The staff member looked at me so I put my passport on the desk and she staff simply asked grumpily how many people were checking in and when I said five responded I‚Äôll need all five passports. At this point my husband took over and I took the kids to sit and wait. During check in he asked the reception staff if we had the interconnecting rooms we had requested and was told we did. Unfortunately when we went upstairs to our rooms we found that we did not

title: Dorsett Food Tour
desc: The tour guide and food location is a must try for anyone staying at the hotel on Sunday. The tour is free to join and you get to try a variety of popular Singaporean local food. Highly recommend!! üôÇ

title: Love the food tour by Phui Ling and Rina
desc: The hotel facilities are nice. We went on a complimentary food tour with the Phui Ling and Rina and they‚Äôre great hosts! We tried many Local Singaporean dishes and we enjoyed it alot! My favorite is the durian pastry!

title: Cool place, location is awesome.
desc: Cool place, location is awesome. We were able to do an early check in. Thank god! As we‚Äôve been traveling for 20 hs. Thanks Rowell for the help üëèüèªüëèüèª. We had a room with nice views from downtown

title: Appreciation to Anthea
desc: Excellent location and excellent service. Very convenient for transport, food and shopping. Service staff were very helpful especially the front desk staff Anthea, who always has a smile and went the extra length to help us. We are very appreciative of her and also with the porters. Keep up the good work.

title: Singa-Pura Vida üá∏üá¨
desc: Coming from Dubai and staying from Dorsett was an amazing experience! Dorsett also offers a FREE food tour that really provides a truly unique culture experience. You literally can‚Äôt ask for more: 5 star experience ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Lost n Found by Hotel Service
desc: I lost my phone at expo, and I really don't know how to find, but when I talk to the hotel front desk, they try help me to find it. I got it back finally cause they helped n really appreciated that, thank you so much Syahirah n Anthea ‚ô•Ô∏èüôèüèª

title: Dorsett Foodie Tour
desc: Good foodie tour. Short simple and nice. Tour guides were helpful and insightful. Suitable for most tourist. Not too spicy, sweet, sour, salty, etc. Maybe durian is a bit pungent but 5 stars for me. Hehe

title: good hotel best staff
desc: the best location! near a train station and china town. one of the best hawker place is a walking distance from the hotel. but the best part is the staff, they were so patient and kind! they always give great answers to all our questions and gave in to all our requests. rowell in the front desk was the best. my friend forgot her air pods and we were able to get it back thru rowell‚Äôs assistance.

title: Lovely hotel, lovely people, Rowell & Jermaine
desc: Rowell and Jermaine are really helpful and lovely to talk to. 10/10 service. It‚Äôs this kind of service that always bring people back to the hotels. Friendly check in service and helped us plan our day.

title: Wonderful Service
desc: DENNIS - Sales Director was wonderful in accommodating to all of our event needs. Despite the many last minute changes, Dennis and team were very understanding. They had delivered what they promised. Our guests had a wonderful stay in Dorsett. Thank you so much.

title: Firts time in this experience. We to make News friends
desc: nice walk around the restaurant. Maybe we need more time each place. Congratulations, Thank very much, for your pacience in the traslator, and explication por cada dish of food. The guides were very hot

title: Awesome Stay
desc: The best stay and great staff. Thank you Rowell for helping us to have a great stay. Room and hotel are very great and accessible to everything. Breakfast is sumptuous. Will back again and stay. Love this hotel

title: Strongly recommend !
desc: I would like to say a very pleasant stay at dorsett Singapore!! The room was comfortable and clean, and I strong recommend to go on the half day tour arranged by the hotel. It was surprisingly amazing with wonderful food and enthusiastic guide and it‚Äôs totally free! I would definitely stay in this hotel next time.

title: Our experience at Dorsett Singapore
desc: We had really enjoyed the foodie tour that Dorsett hotel has offered to us. It was a pleasant experience exploring the region around the Chinatown and eating a lot of food. The tour guide was knowledgeable and friendly. The hotel room itself was quite spacious. The service was excellent and the staff were nice.

title: The hotel staff was very helpful
desc: The hotel has a very good location and it is close to everything. Chinatown is within walking distance and metro stations are right across the street. Most importantly, I would like to give a big thanks to the hotel staff team (Anthea, Kim Hock, Jermaine) who helped me recover my lost phone. Without their kindness and help, it would be impossible for me to locate my phone. I would definitely recommend stay here again in the future.

title: Dorsett Singapore
desc: The hotel is in such a convenient position. The rooms are very spacious. But the highlight is the FREE Foodie Tour of Chinatown! We ate until we couldn‚Äôt eat anymore. The highlight of the trip. Loved it!

title: Nice hotel and friendly staff
desc: Nice hotel and service offered. Good location, beside train station and near China Town area. Enjoy the hotel a lot. The staffs are nice and friendly. The hotel has arranged a foodie tour (limited time), tried authentic local food which is very nice.

title: Great Stay
desc: Hotel is strategically located above outram mrt. Had a short stay and front desk staff are very friendly. Even though hotel is abit outdated in design, staff are very accommodating to our request in showing us direction and a lot of food eateries nearby.

title: Wow ü§©
desc: Excellent location with close access to the MRT. The Sunday Foodie Tour is a must try for anyone visiting, allowing you try foods from all over in a short but fulfilling experience. The guide from the hotel is also super helpful in experienced in the local food scene and gives life and history to the tour.

title: Amazing Sunday Foodie Tour!
desc: They brought me to the Sunday foodie tour! Splendid job, everything was delicious. Prepare to eat lots. Support local industry, I love the concept. I went on a business trip and made friends along the way

title: Excellent location, friendly staff & complimentary food tour
desc: We had an outstanding staycation experience at Dorsett Hotel. The hotel's prime location in Chinatown, near the MRT station, made it incredibly convenient for us to explore the surroundings. The staff were not only friendly but also knowledgeable about the various activities available for visitors. One highlight of our stay was the complimentary food tour that allowed us to savor the local culinary delights in a well-organized manner. Without a doubt, I highly recommend taking part in this fantastic experience. Overall, our stay at Dorsett Singapore was exceptional, perfectly complemented by the ideal location and the warm hospitality of the staff.

title: Clean & strategic hotel
desc: They have a complimentary foodie tour on sunday mornings around the hotel. It's good. But make sure no breakfast before because you will feel super full after. It's a small group, good for networking. Hotel is decent overall. A little bit older than expected, but it's clean and sufficient. Location is strategic, close to outram which has 3 MRT lines.

title: Dorsett Hotel Singapore
desc: Centrally located - beside Outram MRT & walking distance of Chinatown. Comfortable air-conditioned bedroom cleaned daily. 25m outdoor pool ideal for coping with the humidity. Very friendly & helpful staff. Amazing foodie tour of local food places offered to guests on Sunday 10:30 to 13:00. Skip breakfast before the tour! Umbrellas supplied by hotel for unexpected showers. Would highly recommend the Dorsett Hotel in Singapore.

title: Good, excellent. Recommended
desc: The room is good and clean. Its quite spacy for hotels in SG. The location is strategic where we can easily shops and find food nearby. The MRT station is just about 3 minutes walk from hotel, and near to bus stop too. We also had foodie tour arraged by hotel (every Sunday), we had good experience eating local foods here, like 5 types of food : first we went to Tong Ah cafe to have coffee and toast. secondly we went to eat Prata indian food, thirdly we went to nasi lemak, then we try fruit rujak and laksa. Lastly we went to eat durian puff

title: Housekeeper is a thief!!!
desc: staying 4 days at room 302, from 29Apr to 2May unfortunately we left money in the luggage, the housekeeping stole all the money , really untrusted that they check all the customer luggage and doing really bad job at cleaning, i hope hotel notice this

title: Ok - but not the 4 star hotel it claims.
desc: Look, it‚Äôs clean and pretty central, but definitely not either a 4 star hotel or an amazing experience. Room is very small and fittings nowhere near luxury. Towels small and thin. Breakfast buffet looked very ordinary so we didn‚Äôt have it (took a short to The Populus instead, where the food was amazing). Pool area ok, but not exciting. Stunned by the fact that there are only those horrible powdered creamer sachets in the room - when I went to reception and politely asked for some milk for my morning tea I was told they didn‚Äôt have any! I then went to restaurant but had to be fairly insistent to get some. Not good enough really, I‚Äôm afraid.

title: Nice for family and couple hotel
desc: Nice hotel just a few steps from Outram Park Station. Very nearby to Chinatown, and there is complementary food tour on Sunday for hotel guest. We joined the tour, had 5 meals of various local foods, really enjoy the experience.

title: The wonderful weekend-only foodie tour by the Dorsett
desc: We were actually staying in a different hotel the previous day and unfortunately most hotels were either fully booked or ridiculously too expensive on the Hari Raya weekend. We searched and searched through the internet and found this cool, stylish, art-deco-vibed hotel called Dorsett in Chinatown (which btw is not far from the previous hotel we stayed at) an available room at a reasonable price. The best part was when we checked in, we were lucky enough to notice at the receptionist that the hotel has this special program called foodie tour in the neighborhood around the hotel every Sunday that would last for few hours that normally accommodates for 12 people only. Then we asked if we can still join and fortunately the receptionist said yes so we decided to register ourselves

title: Trustworthy Staff - looks out for their guests
desc: I left my bag in the lobby. Kim found my bag and Rowell found me panicking and looking around and asked me if I lost my bag. He had me describe the bag just to be sure it was indeed mine. He returned it to me once I answered his question. He told me to be careful in the kindest way possible, especially since people are free to come and go from the lobby. Kim also has the sweetest smile on his face when I see him in the lobby. I‚Äôm so grateful Kim and Rowell were alert and kept my bag for safekeeping. So happy with them! Will stay here again in my next trip which is in two weeks! :)

title: Good service during week long group stay
desc: We have a group of 25 pax in the hotel in March for a week Dennis provided good service during this period and was very helpful when it comes to booking, resolving on-site issues and ensuring that our party are on the complimentary morning shuttle everyday. We are very thankful to Dennis for this good service!!!

title: Good hotel, great service, excellent location
desc: Located above Outram Park MRT means most central locations only couple of stops away, and Chinatown and Maxwell hawker centre only 5 minutes walk. Hotel rooms of a good standard and perfectly clean, and staff were very helpful and gave me an early (8am!) check in after my overnight flight from Europe ‚Ä¶thanks Hidayah!

title: Nice Hotel! Convenient Location! Food Tour!
desc: Nice hotel, very convenient location. Food tour arranged by the hotel was the highlight of the trip. Dennis, Steven and Irene were great tour guides. The food was a walking tour to near by local spots near China Town.

title: Memorable 1st experience
desc: I would like to express my greatest thanksful to Front Desk Farid, he being so polite to my family since the day we approach him, he also help guide us from hotel to Jb, he had good communication skill, also sharing some his fav place in singapore. Your team should give him some token for this. Hope to see him on my next tripü´∞üèª

title: Great value for short stays
desc: Fantastic service particularly the Foodie Tour. Our guides were really really good. The rooms are about what one would expect for a four star; small rooms but the bed is huge. Location is extremely good too right next to an MRT station.

title: Great location
desc: Checked in late 12 midnight. Staff at desk friendly and efficient. Got into room so hot 29 degrees. Recommend turning aircon on prior to guest arrival. It took till 4 am to cool to 21. Also phone and TV didn't work. Reception came to our aid but had to go up and down in lift many times. Asked for an upgrade but just moved to same room where everything worked. Location fantastic, 20 mtrs from front door to subway, just go Lt. Pool beautiful, lovely temperature and beautifully clean. No broken tiles I could see. More shade over sun beds than in picture which was good.The room was a decent size for Singapore, just a weird setup with shower door. You have to open hall way door to get out of shower as shower door can't open all the way. For convenience, size of room,staff and

title: Comfortable Hotel
desc: The Dorsett is great value, the room had everything we needed, clean, comfy bed, separate bath and shower, ironing board, tea and coffe and small fridge, good size TV. View to the pool which was lovely and refreshing, cooling but not cold. Had an electrical buzz in the room but they sorted that out once we let them know. Farid booked us in and was very helpful over the days we stayed there, thanks for the assistance.

title: Good place to stay!
desc: Was referred by colleague and found it's up to the value! close to China town and MRT station which is convinient no matter for work and for fun :) credit to Dennis (Sales Director) which take care of the details and made a good experience to stay in SG!

title: Amazing Hotel
desc: Went for staycay when they reopen for public. A little bit understaffed as there is a bit of queue, but receptionist is always putting in their best effort to accommodate al guest. Unfortunately they are once again close for staycay, will be back again if times permit.

title: First Time Stay in Singapore
desc: The property and the personnel were very good. I was part of a tour group as a western solo senior traveler. Being on top of an MRT stop was very handy. I very much enjoyed the close proximity to Chinatown. Bay Gardens being close by also. Completely out of sync with this experience was the breakfast. For a 4 star property the breakfast choices were minimal, the scrambled eggs, which was more like a soup and the under cooked bacon were very marginal in trusting proper preparation, but the undercooking was made up by the over cooked fried eggs. It was an odd combination with the property being so nice. Had breakfast not been included in the tour I would have sought the morning meal elsewhere.

title: Good service
desc: We stayed here for 5 days. The room is small. And we didn't like the toilet because there was a big gap in the toilet room and the closet so you can see whats going inside. But the staff were friendly .

title: Go if you like convenience
desc: We stayed in two different rooms over the span of a week and the experience was consistent: Pros: - excellent location, extremely convenient- right next to MRT and prime landmarks. - quick checkin, checkout - shorts waiting time for lifts - housekeeping staff was friendly Cons: - NOT CLEAN- hair on sink, flies in sink, stains on the sheets. - Musty smell everywhere, especially the toilet - Aged and some rusty furniture - Aircon temperature control doesn‚Äôt work well - No instructions on how to use the safe - Staff response rate was very slow Overall, location is really the selling point of this hotel but considering the cons, it is really not worth the price (around 190 SGD per night).

title: Staff went the extra mile
desc: The rooms in Dorsett is not up to the standard but I have to compliment your Duty Manager Rina for being so professional and attending to our problems. She is very proactive and is an asset to the company. Bravo to Rina! Cheers!

title: Convenient, Clean and Friendly
desc: The location of the hotel is perfect adjacent to Outram Park MRT station which makes it easy to move around. Clean rooms, housekeeping staff were very helpful. Reception desk were helpful, friendly and approachable and always smiling. Dinning area was clean. Breakfast had those yummiest croissant. Ideal location and Friendly staff , makes it a must stay.

title: Mr Dalton
desc: Shocking place! Me and my girl friend picked this hotel for its roof top pool,we paid a lot of money also and was really looking forward to staying here. After travelling all the way from England with my my partner both very tired and jet lagged. We arrive to a sign in reception saying the pool is closed. This is absolutely disgusting,no email informing us that it is closed/nothing what so ever. It‚Äôs actually ruined our holiday. We can‚Äôt afford to move to another hotel as we paid so much for this roof top pool hotel. The staff aren‚Äôt bothered either,I just wish we was told before hand as we could‚Äôve changed hotel. We should be given a full refund. Avoid at all costs,unless you would like to be ripped off as well.

title: Let down by the service
desc: I stayed here for six nights on business in October and November. The rate was similar to other four star hotels in the area, so that's what I have compared it to in terms of standard. The positives ‚Ä¢ The room was clean and the bed comfortable ‚Ä¢ Good shower ‚Ä¢ Wifi worked well, good signal and no interruptions ‚Ä¢ Good location ‚Ä¢ A 30m outdoor pool The negatives ‚Ä¢ I arrived just after 10pm from a 20 hour flight. The only option to eat something was a vending machine in the lobby - there was no other room service or offer to help bring food in from outside. If the front desk had offered to help with this, it would have been appreciated. It the sort of thing other hotels in this bracket have done for me in the past. ‚Ä¢ The room was very small. There was only space for a

title: service quality
desc: Good location, very near to china town and just next to outram park mrt station. The room is small, service is just so so. Upon arrival there was someone who helped us on the luggages (1 big luggage, 1 hand carry and `1 bag) until the lobby. Upon check in we need to carry our own luggages to the room. The room is small. hardly place to move around. Room amenities some are worn out. Surprisingly they only give a pack of toothbrush with no toothpaste. weighing machine was not working, fridge was working but not cold at all. We asked the housekeeping to change all these. took quite a while for weighing machine to be changed. we stayed 3 nites, on the 2nd nites, the room was not cleaned at all. we couldn't be bothered to call them since we came back to the room quite

title: disappointing- no pool as under repair & no advice
desc: Gave cut & paste reply to messages & not answering the question asked. Booked on certain features ie pool but on arrival notice on desk saying closed for repairs. Had been under repair for number of days but no e mail to let us know so we could reconsider. No upgrade , free drink or hardly a sorry. No Mgt follow up. Issues with wifi & room clean

title: Excellent Customer Service
desc: I booked Dorset Singapore on 4th Nov 2022 for two nights . Front desk staff Miss Rina goes the extra mile to ensure my mum got the same level as my room. A million thanks to you and all front desk staff.

title: Worst Experience ever!! Power outage without notice!
desc: We r on planned holiday and at 11+pm at night while we already all sleeping , there is power outage. So a few other rooms customers walk down to the lobby and asked. Apparently there is a planned power outage instructed by government . The earliest power would be back is probably about 1am .. and that‚Äôs still tbc. So some people here wandering at the lobby and asking for solution! They told everyone that there‚Äôs a notice sent to everyone. But the fact is , we didn‚Äôt know where the notice is and regardless notice or not, we paid money to have a great experience and good stay ! Not like this! There is not even any contingency plan and they informed us that this is something they would need to do every year ! If this is needed to be done every year why wouldn‚Äôt there be contingency

title: Dorset Hotel
desc: I chose DorsetHotel instead of Furama City as it was slightly more expensive so I thought it would be better and it is next door to MRT however it isn‚Äôt really in Chinatown it‚Äôs in Outram Park one stop to China town or a decent walk. On arrival I was blindsided with 4240 COVID cleaning fee. I was there for 8 nights only because I had prepaid. During that time the sheets were never changed. Cleaning staff were friendly however there was no cleaning just replacement of what was used and tidying up bed that explains the mould in shower and around rim of vanity. Given a choice I would have stayed at Furama city nice looking hotel, cheaper and closer to Chinatown.

title: One of the best hotel location is Singapore
desc: Fantastic location with the hotel located beside train station and plenty of food within walking distance from the hotel. It is also located in the middle of singapore where you can go anywhere conveniently. Price point is reasonable given the size of the room.

title: Good location
desc: Located right above the metro station. Room and bathroom were fairly clean. We could not figure out how to turn off one of the lights in the bathroom so it was on all night (did not ask either so partially our fault). Small room but the staff was friendly.

title: Bad experience: personal item went missing after room was made up
desc: Check in and out was okay. Room cleanliness is okay too. Pool experience was good, pool water was not cold, a little warm, which is great. But swimming at night may be too dim and dark. Located just a stone throw from Outram Park MRT Station. There's no shopping mall or convenience shop nearby, so during my stay i would just take 1 station down to Chinatown to shop and buy food. However, we had a really bad experience during our 3D2N stay. On the 2nd day, we allowed the Housekeeping attendant to make up the room while we were out. We returned in the afternoon. In the evening when we were about to go for a swim, I realised that my daughter's swimming vest went missing. I searched high and low for it, but couldn't find it. I called Housekeeping, but was transferred to

title: Comfortable
desc: Went here for a one-night staycation and had a good experience with the hotel. Staff were friendly and accommodating to our request for early check-in, and the room was comfortable and sufficiently large for 2 people such that it didn't feel cramped. Great location with lots of food and sights nearby, and definitely worth the price.

title: Dirty room
desc: The room and common areas were in bad shape and very dirty, the staff was not professional. It‚Äôs definitely not a 4 star hotels and the price is totally not worth. I don‚Äôt recommend this hotel since there are better solutions in Singapore at these prices. Stay away from Dorsett Singapore.

title: Great Hotel Stay for Business or Casual
desc: I've booked the hotel rooms for my company's overseas guests. Much appreciation to Dennis Lim (Assistant Director of Sales) who has rendered great support during the booking and stay. Made multiple changes for the booking but Dennis was always there to assist promptly and we were fortunate to get the rooms during some of the high occupancy period. Great stay and location is very accessible by public transport. Many great food and restaurants around. The rooms are clean and neat. Hotel has vending machine at ground floor for guests to purchase snacks & tidbits and there is also a foreign currency exchange machine which also provide convenience to guests. Overall, a nice and pleasant stay for the guests.

title: Excellent Service from Dennis Lim, Sales Director!
desc: Dennis is very attentive, helpful and easy to work with... He takes feedback seriously and is intentional in handling it. This is despite the fact that our company guests are in the hotel during F1 which is very peak period. We can easily get good service when it's low season but to put in that extra effort during peak period says a lot! I'm very impressed! I've had the pleasure of working with him and will definitely try to use the hotel as much as possible as I'm very confident he will take care of all the guests well especially our company's VIPs.

title: Bring your own vacuum cleaner and cleaning equipment
desc: This property markets itself as 4 star. Sadly anything but. We had 2 a-joining rooms. The hotel and rooms are filthy. See attached photos. Corridor to rooms dirty with rubbish and dusty. Were not cleaned at all during our 5 days. Shower mouldy. Room was not clean with dust and marks on glass doors of bathroom. Someone else‚Äôs hair clippings on the bathroom sink. Sheet had yellow stain on it. Cooked Breakfast included but every day it was stone cold.

title: Great Stay
desc: Convenient as it is just below the train station. Many eateries place nearby and walking distance. Room size is adequate and good view facing the city. Friendly staff and responsive for requests. Will come back and stay

title: Great stay for the price
desc: Great stay. Nothing really bad to drive home about. I booked Splash Room as I wanted a bathtub and was quite surprised how big the bathroom was. It made the room a lot bigger than what the pictures or other reviews say. If I have to suggest a room I would say Splash Room or higher. Noise isolation was astounding. Couldn't hear the street at all. Perhaps it was because I was facing the residential side and on the 4th floor. Could not hear other travelers as well. Room was a nice but a little on the dated side. Carpet was a little dated. Noticed some stains. They had only given 2 pillows but gladly gave me another 2 more on request. Room has a 1st generation smart TV that allows you to connect your phone via bluetooth to play audio. No Netflix etc but you can connect your

title: JPH
desc: The hotel is very well located in Chinatown and easy to connect to anywhere with MRT few steps away. Staff are very friendly and happy to help. I travel quite often and in SG I always three (easy to go either to West or East of the city) Dennis is my main contact for all the arrangements when I stay there. Very professional and always great help. Many thanks Dennis. I travel a lot within Asia and I can say you are the best BD Dennis. So do not hesitate to stay at Dorsett SG

title: Superb stay where I can enjoy my weekends as well as "work from hotel" in great comfort.
desc: 1) Check-in counter staff are kind, friendly and professional when dealing with hotel guests. 2) Room size with King-sized bed is just awesome for me, and the room cleanliness is in tip-top condition. 3) Complimentary items in the room (bottled water, coffee & tea bags) are topped up daily. 3) Location is perfect with MRT stations (purple & green lines) just below the hotel. In additional, there is a bus-stop just outside the hotel. Location is just a 5-min walk to the bustling and popular Chinatown shopping & dining areas. 4) Will definitely recommend my friends, clients and family members to stay in this hotel. 5) Last but not least, my sincere appreciation to the Sales Director, Dennis Lim (my main contact for my booking arrangement), who has done a great job in

title: Strategic location for business or casual
desc: Situation at the cusp of Chinatown and business district connected to the Outram station gives ample opportunity to explore Singapore Got a loft room on the second floor. View facing the road where police station is. However happy to report it was not noisy at all. Spaces in room very efficient. Two televisions in the loft sleeping area and downstairs. Bathroom had no tub but taps and shower heads good water pressure with hot water Toilet extremely clean. No bidet was my only disappointment Overall a nice stay and recommended for those looking for a cheap stay

title: Bad facilties
desc: Make loft room booking via Agoda. Near to date then hotel announced pool under reno and already past cancellation date and can't cancel booking anymore. Worse, room toilet was choke and no other loft room to change and just shortchange at lower value room. Ask for compensation but proclaim need seek higher management opinions and nothing done. Total ruined of our staycation.

title: Dorsett Hotels Wonderful Location
desc: Located near Outram Park MRT with access to East West North South North East Line central of Singapore. Near tourists attractions of Sir mariamman temple and Budhha Tooth Temple! Near Sago Lane whereby Chinatown tourists Hip Hop bus located. Those who like to see view of Singapore City can buy easy link cards to go up 50 stoery buildings at Neil road. Foodies will like this place of 24hrs Food outlet like Great Wall Porridge and German Fine Dinning resturant. Near with Smith Street Hawker with variety of foods. Those drinkers would like like the pubs dotted along Neil roads. Exercise lovers like the morning exercise at Duxton Hills plain #

title: Good location, unfriendly staff
desc: Got a nice deal, so we gave it a try. Location is very good as most attractions are within 15-minute taxi ride. Room was decent but began to look tired. Fridge was very dirty. Don't expect smiling staff here, especially those at front desk who had never greeted us and seemed to be upset when we complained about room being not ready at check-in time.

title: Request for additional amenities.
desc: Check in yesterday for quarantine order. First time ask for simple request but can't fulfill. The staffs mentioned one pillow will only be given for single occupant. Suggest me to ask my family members to bring for me. Totally can't sleep well for yesterday due to pillow issue. Second, are we not allow to use bathtub?

title: Best thing about the hotel is the location!
desc: Stayed at the Dorsett for a few weeks. We had stayed there a couple of years ago and it wasn‚Äôt bad, so we decided to stay again, mainly due to the location. Check-in was painless and the room was available early for us, so we appreciated being able to gain access to our room earlier in the day. As we had separate bookings, the hotel assisted us in moving to the upgraded room midway through our stay. The best thing about Dorsett is the location - it is absolutely fantastic with easy access to the foodie delights and activity of Chinatown, close enough to Tanjong Pagar and Tiong Bahru, and a nice walk to Clarke Quay and the Singapore river. My husband enjoyed the access to the pool which due to COVID you had to book in advance. Staff at reception and facilities were generally

title: Traffic noise & pillows awful
desc: This is the worst hotel I have ever slept in. We booked the loft room. It‚Äôs only on L2 so just avoid it. Traffic, man-hole cover noise & thick high pillows made the sleep unbearable. Plus I had ear plugs on. The loft is very tiny. There‚Äôs hardly any vanity space in bathroom. No bathtub. A tiny 2-seater sofa which sits 2 slim adults. Desk space, wardrobe & bed is ok. 18 steps to your mattress. There‚Äôs a clock which reads january & time a couple of hours off. it put a smile on my morning face after having a lack of sleep. My all sides frayed bath towel sent an indication how sad it was & made me feel the same! Told both morning receptionists on 28th April.

title: Nice hotel with good service and great location
desc: I‚Äôve had a long stay at Dorsett Hotel Singapore for my business trip and been assisted nicely by Dennis from Sales team. The hotel was well-decorated, clean and very convenient for food, drinks and other working stuffs (near MOM, Chinatown, Tanjong Pagar community center..). Would love to stay here for my next trip.

title: Anniversary Stay
desc: We chose Dorsett Singapore for our anniversary stay this year. It was overall a great stay. Would like to thank all the staff from reservation, reception to housekeeping for the great effort to decorate the room which was a surprised for us. Love the drawing! Currently they are having a promotion which I think it's value for money. You may check them out if you plan to have a staycation. :)

title: It ain't at all exciting....
desc: Went to take a break and tried this hotel. Check in was fast, but getting to be served by the receptionist was long. Another male receptionist was engaged on the phone and later left the counter, leaving the poor lady to manage all those in queue. When I opened the door, was greeted by a view which is facing rooms of others. Nice decor are just on the outside, room is just average, with a bit back dated things in the room. Don't ever forget to bring along your phone charger plugs as they don't have USB ports, where you can just plug in the cords and charge the phone. Nothing really fantastic about this hotel, which I don't really recommend to my contacts.

title: Cosy Little Alcove in a Heritage Zone!
desc: My experience with Dorsett Singapore was overall a pleasant one. Upon arrival, I was subjected to a series of health declarations, much more extensive than any other hotels I have visited so far. The reception staff was polite and courtly, and empahsised that due to the size of my room, I could only have a maximum of 2 guests, even though the general guidelines in Singapore say that it's a maximum of 5. That did disrupt the plans a little but I made do. The room had a few minor issues when I first arrived. 3 of the light sources in the room was not working properly, and unfortunately some of the additional things I have requested for was not fulfilled. But they made it up by sending a gorgeous came from the famous Keong Saik Bakery, along with a drawing on the glass surfaces

title: Nice hotel with warm service
desc: Love this hotel location, I decided to move from a five star hotel to Dorsett. I had been stranded in SG since MCO and CB between JB/SG. Food, transportation to work and accommodation are my primary consideration. Thanks to the sales team (Dennis) to secure long term stay in Dorsett with a special rate. The room is clean and comfort with great service by their housekeeping team. The only suggestion to improve the APP for safe entry and input the daily repetition questions though you are registered guest.

title: 2 Days in Singapore
desc: Due to a scheduling mix up, I ended up going to Singapore by myself. I was greeted at the Hotel and given a room with a Koi Carp pond outside it, which was fantastic. The Hotel is situated right by Chinatown, and within the Business district, and sits on top of the Outram Park MRT station making getting around very easy. A special mention to all the staff who made my stay so good....May Kwan, Darius, Yadi, Iram, Jennifer, & Jermaine. Looking forward to coming back.

title: God service
desc: Wonderful room n nice view..Have wonderful n helpful staff ness n respectful... Have a great day everyday with them.. Suntar, Amira,Darius,may and Oonah.. Will recommend to friends as it is near mrt and Chinatown area.

title: Shout out to Mr Yadi
desc: Appreciate the extra mile service by Mr Yafi who made my surprise celebration a success! Appreciate the handwritten card which gives it an extra service! Thank you for the hard work. Had a wonderful sty and the room was very cozy and really clean. Thumbs up for the great job!

title: Cheap and cheerful
desc: This is a cheap and cheerful hotel, that's in a great area of Singapore. It has an amazing bath in the Splash Room, which was a highlight. the swimming area is on teh basic side, but it is modern and good for exercise. there's no F&B at all, But they allow deliveries from Grab or Deliveroo.

title: What an amazing stay
desc: We arrived here without even booking and decided on the spot we wanted to stay here, the staff was so nice and helpfull! The room was immense and had everything you could wish for, the bed was nice and soft (we wanted to spend more time in it just to be able to enjoy it). There are construction works going on across the street (you can see them from the pool) but the noise was actually quite okay. The staff is taking the Covid 19 measures serious and are really making their best effort to ensure everybody has the best time while keeping safety and health in mind. We would definitly stay here again! We would like to give special thanks to Jermaine for making our stay one to remember (her other colleges also deserve an applause for all their efforts)! The hotel is located just

title: Great Experience
desc: Amazing service from the staffs. Check in was smooth and fast. Got complimentary upgrade, sweet cookies and wonderful card from Manager Yadi (to be specific). As i was celebrating my 5th anniversary with my partner. Top notch service by him! Great service and we were treated hime King & Queen on our stay. Room was huge and romantic! Excellent Yadi! Couldnt have spend my anniversary other place else.

title: School Holiday Staycay
desc: Its the school holiday and also the birthday month of my firstborn so we spent 2nights in a splash room. Glad we booked early cos was told that the splash room was a fav. Now i know whyyy and id come back for it again. Dorsett is located right smack in Chinatown. An area id never thought of staying for i thought it was jus out of the way from town but my stay there changed everything. Outram NEL is jus right below n it links with Outram EWL. Jus one stop away to Harbour front/vivo and walking distance to chinatown point and keong saik. Cafes, restaurants, Bars are all walking distance and its just so convenient. Now i see why Dorsett is a hotspot for tourists. I too dont quite like the idea of a staycay and having to travel soo far for food or drinks cos i like to spend more

title: Very good
desc: Nice hotel, clean hotel, my company was very nice to arrange my group to stay here, convenient location and the staffs are nice too. They check our temperature every time we go in and out and never gets tired. The Receptionist staffs all very nice and always say hello to us, Oonah, Jermaine, Suntar all very nice. We are very happy

title: Pleasant experience
desc: Staff were warm, friendly and quick to assist us. Hotel room was clean, albeit smaller than expected. Nevertheless, a pleasant stay for my wife and I, overall. Thank you for the complimentary breakfast!

title: Staycation at Dorsett
desc: My wife and I had a good staycation for couple of days recently at Dorsett Hotel Singapore located at New Bridge Road. Wonderful location connected by MRT lines and SBS buses. It‚Äôs all a matter of 5 to10 mins walk from the hotel to the transport links to go to any part of Singapore. The other big plus of the hotel is its location which is right smack in the middle of Chinatown. You have access to all the eateries like Food courts located in Maxwell Hong Lim and not forgetting Chinatown Point. The hidden food treasures in Keong Saik Road, Bukit Pasoh,Smith street, mosque street and pagoda street are countless, if you need to fulfil your gastronomic needs. The Dorsett hotel entrance and lobby is swanky and lovely it was quiet though but well served with good reception by front

title: Really enjoyable staycation!
desc: Picked Dorsett for a 1 night staycation to celebrate my boyfriend's birthday as it's reasonable priced for a 4-star hotel and conveniently located above Outram Park MRT. The staffs at Dorsett are really welcoming and helpful which easily brightens everyone's mood! Special thanks for the complimentary birthday cake!! In addition, the Dorsett Room is clean and spacious which comes with a really comfortable King sized bed! Highly recommend Dorsett to tourists and even Singaporeans for a relaxing treat! :)

title: Quick Staycation
desc: Location: Right above the Outram Park mrt station. With a sort of dedicated route to the hotel via an elevator from right inside the station.  Very convenient. Hotel room: Size is not that spacious but still okay at 22m2 as per its website for the basic room. Our booked King bed was actually 2 singles merged into one. Minus a point for not informing us at the reception. Overall room is clean. Bathroom/toilet is very small. First time I ever got "damaged" twice while in the toilet during my shower. First my right hand swung onto the bath soap tray during shower and while drying myself outside the shower my back knocked against the metal sharp end of the shower door handle. Fortunately it was not that hard that would cause a deep painful bruise. Lastly the toilet door was not

title: What a great welcome üôèüèº
desc: We were greeted by the smiling reception guy, now friend, Yadi! After nearly 3 weeks of travel he was a breath of fresh air. We have stayed in a lot of hotels üè® on this trip and the greeting we received here was exceptional. We had problems with our room safe which was fixed as quickly. They care here - stay, you won‚Äôt be sorry. The room is t huge but has everything we need. Thanks Dorset!!

title: Memorable time at Dorsett
desc: Hi, My family and I had a staycation at Dorsett last Chinese New Year. It was the first time that we brought our grandson with us to a local Singapore hotel. The swimming pool was a pleasant amenity for all of us because my grandson loves water. You staff also are very friendly and accommodating. We did not have any unpleasant experience especially on that special day. Thank you for a memorable time. Best regards, Dr Utanes Godofredo Cristobal

title: Hot water issue & unpleasant staff
desc: Stayed here recently for 2 nights, booked this hotel because it has a great 5 ‚≠êÔ∏è review.. upon arrival on 2nd Jan, hot/warm water wasn‚Äôt available(decided to gv it a slide). Woke up next day(OUR WEDDING DAY) still no hot water to shower... gave them a call to check whats up? Staff said the lower floors were affected due to the weather üôÑüôÑ and technicians are trying to rectify the problem... okay.. went out and came back to the hotel at 10.30pm!!!! STILL NO HOT WATER TO BATHE!?!? Requested to move us to a higher floor where the ‚Äúhigh floors‚Äù weren‚Äôt affected much..my husband and I were put through multiple calls with the staff back and forth until 1:30am just to move us to a higher floor but they refused to... all they could offer is just a later checkout time for more rest...

title: So-so hotel
desc: Stayed here for two nights in a standard room with no breakfast Cons Rooms are old and tired. Musty smell in the room. Dirty carpets. Pool area has no towels - they are actually in your room. No pool bar or music. Housekeeping left us a note at before 12 telling us they tried to clean the room but our DND light was lit. Don‚Äôt think that‚Äôs necessary unless it‚Äôs late afternoon - waste of paper. Small bottles of water provided Pros Good location Elemis shampoo and shower gel Friendly staff Safety feature - need to use hotel key card to enter hotel after a certain time Additional point Since i stayed at the hotel during the coronavirus, the hotel had a sign stating that staff have taken precautions etc etc and are wearing masks etc etc however I did not see one member

title: Great staff
desc: Not only a great staff but extremely clean and well located hotel. Literally you are a few feet from being able to get on the subway. In a nice area of china town with great food and shopping. Make sure you eat at the restaurant and Jackie will make you feel like you‚Äôre part of the family. The food is excellent and the place is so clean you will not be scared to eat there even during coronavirus. The rooms were a nice size and great water pressure. highly recommend this hotel and even if you don‚Äôt stay there eat at the restaurant.

title: Super Amazing staff, great location,very nice room and love the atmosphere
desc: The staff were very approachable and helpful especially the hotel manager Mr Yadi,i really want to thank him and appreciated him for the awesome hospitality provided and he help us a lot too!Highly recommend this place for the excellent location and just 1 min away from MRT station. Room decoration very nice and very clean.i stayed here twice and ill be repeating again!

title: A Christmas Staycation at Dorsett
desc: Last Christmas 2020, I've decided to book a 4 days 3 night staycation at Dorsett hotel to relax, enjoy and have some me time. I went to their site directly to enjoy some great offers like 12% off and free upgrade to next room category. I booked a Dorsett room and upon check-in my wishes were granted. They upgraded me to Deluxe and a late check out. The other offer if you book direct on their site is the complimentary limited edition Dorsett Eco straw. The check-in process is very well organized and managed adhering to safe distancing measures properly. In addition, health screening is enforced before you enter the hotel lobby. The lobby is grand, with their lovely huge Crystal Chandelier, Grand Piano and the decor is quite exquisite. I loved the black tone of the interior

title: A hotel in a perfect location while still in its own peace and quiet
desc: I was visiting my friend in Singapore and stayed in this hotel for 6 nights.The hotel location was ideal: Chinatown is right next to it (food market,chinatown complex and several temples) and MRT station is right below the hotel, so botanical gardens, Marina Bay, Sentosa and several other places were easily accessible. There is also nice pubs and cafe's in the vicinity of the hotel. Hotel staff was very professional and helpful, room cleaning service worked perfectly, pool was nice and quite large and wifi connection was good. Hotel was in general very clean, the rooms were well equipped and comfortable and ac worked well. All in all, I was very happy to stay in this hotel. One nice thing to add: the view from our hotel window was very nice.

title: Excellent customer service!
desc: From the checkin staff, including Jason, to the dining room manager Jackie, my friend and I had a wonderful experience at the Dorsett. We felt cared for when we needed directions and were offered help to call a taxi as well as confirm the cost. Every morning of our stay, Jackie greeted us and genuinely seemed interested in our day's events as she wished us a good breakfast. The first morning we took her recommendation to try the specialty coconut-filled French toast. Jason helped by offering suggestions for activities to fill one of our evenings. We followed his directions and had a great time on the River Walk. The Dorsett's location is ideal to get around Singapore so easily - I highly recommend the hotel and staff!

title: Extremely courteous, hospitable staff. A very nice hotel that was a short walk away from Chinatown!
desc: The hotel is near Singapore's Chinatown, and a relatively convenient walk to nearby food options. The rooms were very quiet with an adequate amount of space and good quality clean linens. I am especially appreciative of the high water pressure and hot water! I am especially thankful one of the women at reception for rescheduling my stay after I'd inadvertently booked the hotel with the incorrect month. The hospitality at the Dorsett was wonderful, and very much appreciated after a 26-hour-long flight to a new city!

title: Maintenance is a need
desc: We came back for the second time. Service is still good but facilities itself needs to be maintained. The room looks a bit old, even we upgraded. Most important is the toilet was very clean. Thanks to all housekeeping staffs.

title: Amazing customer service
desc: Really wanna compliment Yadi and his team when I was checking in this afternoon. Extremely swift and fast with the process. Me and my partner are very impressed with the customer service that theg provided! Kudos to you guys! Highly recommend this place too for the convenience!! 1 min away from mrt station!!

title: Nice staff and Excellent Location!
desc: Excellent Location just few step from MRT Outram Park station. Nice room decoration. Really appriciate with hotel manager, Yadi, and his staff, Jenny, for a warm welcome in Singapore. Especially, a surprise complementary gift from hotel!! :)

title: Super nice staff, very accommodating, very nice room, great location and wow swimming pool for lap swims.
desc: I was particularly pleased with the prompt, competent and courteous assistance I got from staff persons Yadi and Oonah. Steps from Chinatown with its great shopping and food, and the a metro station right there.

title: Great guest relations!
desc: I would like to compliment Yadi and Jenny for an amazing service rendered. Glad to have been attended by them. They made sure I had a great stay at Dorsett as it was my Hubby's bdae! It was indeed a good one. Well done guys!

title: Review
desc: Hospitable upon arrival, however unhelpful upon departure. Reception staff do not communicate and renege on commitments made by other staff regarding left luggage. Price reasonable, but many better options in Singapore.

title: Excellent staff
desc: We had to book two rooms for our family of 5 which was a but of a downer but nevertheless the hotel helped us check in early thanks to Yadi at the front desk. Since we arrived in the morning after a flight where we couldnt sleep much, checking in early was a real blessing. Yadi also managed to get us two tooms on the same floor which was helpful. There is a restaurant on site. But we get the feeling that the staff are overworked. We saw one of the waiters on duty from the morning and he appeared to have been working right through the day to when we went for dinner after 9 pm. If so, I just hope such long shifts are not mandatory. The hotel in itself is ideally located for China town and was just a 12 dollar grab away from Sentosa in the morning.

title: Nice Hotel
desc: The Dorset is a very nice hotel with good-sized rooms convenient to Chinatown and the MRT ‚Äì and very quiet despite the near-constant flow of traffic on New Bridge Road. There is a small pool off an upper floor. The breakfast offered a good variety of both Asian and Western food.

title: The best gateway to Chinatown
desc: A great hotel, with a privileged location, Chinatown is within a walking distance. I stayed there during the celebrations of the Chinese New Year, which made the whole Chinatown beautifully decorated. To my surprise, the hotel kindly invited the guests to join the Lion Dance, a once in a year event, led by the General Manager, with the participation of executives and hotel staff. It was totally unexpected, which made this experience unforgettable.

title: Comfortable and Quiet
desc: Overall an ok hotel in a good location. The good: Location Quiet generally Comfortable bed and pillows Room is nice and dark The bad: No coffee in room and no room service until the little restaurant opens Breakfast I probably the worst I have had in a hotel and don‚Äôt even start me on the coffee Walls are paper thin could hear the tv and talking from next door The towels oh Dorsett the towels they are thin and bare and falling apart. A simple refresh would make all the difference. Overall not bad but would probably not stay again....

title: Easy Access
desc: One of the smaller sized hotels we have stayed but has all the required amenities. A nice pool, sun bath chair, gym, but no self laundry. It is very near the MRT and bus station, less than a minute away. We were a group of friends who visited Singapore after many years. We were accommodated by 2 lovely ladies Dana & Michelle and got our rooms on the same floor. The bell hop were also helpful for giving maps and assisting for calling taxi. Overall, good value and would stay again if we want to stay in town.

title: Fab Hotel. Great Location. AMAZING BED! Lovely Staff.
desc: We stayed here last year and returned again this year. We booked the smaller room this year as we only stayed two nights. We would advise paying a little extra for the bigger room if you stay more than two nights as the smaller room could become a little claustrophobic. In the smaller room one side of the bed has no side table. THE BED IS SUPER COMFY AND MASSIVE! Best thing about the room. Bedding is sumptuous. Walk in shower is hot and powerful. Room has tea and coffee facilities. International plug sockets for all plugs so no adaptors required. Large in room safe. Robes provided. Good selection of essential toiletries in bathroom. Staff are so helpful and professional. The hotel is next door to a train station so location is great. Chinatown is around a 10 minute walk max

title: Excellent location and level of service! Thankyou so much.
desc: I stayed at Dorsett on my 2 day stop over in Singapore and found the hotel to be fantastic in cleanliness and excellent service by all staff that I met. Yadi was so so welcoming and funny to chat to. I will certainly stay at Dorsett again as the location is perfect for easy access to seeing the main attractions in the city being directly below the Outram Park MRT station. Highly recommended!

title: Strategic Location. Good for Leisure.
desc: The OUTRAM MRT is just a stone's throw away - this is a plus point. Room + Service is clean and comfortable. It is great to have a pool that is surrounded with greens. Parking is SGD$8 per exit. For every time you exit, you need to purchase an exit-coupon at the counter. So, do take note. I think this is a good hotel to stay - especially when you are new to Singapore. Best F&B is all around you. Cafes, pubs and bars, too.

title: Great Accommodation for the week
desc: This a beautifully decorated and presented hotel. The welcome was friendly and helpful from the moment our taxi pulled in. Our room was very comfortable. Bathroom area was a bit small but we managed. The restaurant has a great selection of meals and at a good price. It is situated on the Outram MRT line so you can go anywhere. It‚Äôs also a close walk to the Chinese Markets and around the corner from bakery‚Äôs, restaurants and bars. We walked down New Bridge Road to the river, which isn‚Äôt as far as we thought. Perfect situation to walk or get transport to all the tourist areas as well. Floor 3 has a nice swimming pool which overlooks the street but is quiet and relaxing. Also a gymnasium. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Clean and good location
desc: We got our room upgraded on our recent stay in Dorsett. We are grateful to be granted early check-in after a day of flight. Great location and a lift away from the nearest MRT station, which pretty much gets you everywhere in Singapore. Reception staff were friendly too. Hotel room is clean and better than expected. However, the hotel restaurant is a total no-no. Food quality is poor for a hotel standard and workers are rude and extremely unhelpful. We went for lunch buffet and food are not refilled, so we were literally scraping off the leftovers. Also, room service ends at 10pm, which doesn't serve the purpose as guests would probably need it most at wee hours. We had to order grab food instead.

title: Good and efficient
desc: I stayed for two nights on business. I requested an early arrival as I needed to attend a meeting and my longhaul flight arrived at 9:45am. They got everything ready for me at check in and after a quick check inn I was up and running in no time. The room was the right size, very comfortable bed and has also a nice cascade shower. Amenities in the room were nice and wifi was at good speed suited for working on a presentation and to finish emails. The breakfast was reasonable, it was buffette style and had fruits, juices, some local options and other comon things to meet most tastes. Best thing (appart from very good service) was location, just right on the metro, which is very convenient and efficient. You are also right on the Chinatown and there are many restaurants nearby.

title: Great Hotel with a great service
desc: Yadi was very helpfull during check in and got complimentary late check out from the hotel I got a spacious room with a big bathroom It was very nice stay at Dorsett Singapore Definitely will come back

title: Thanks, Yadi!
desc: everyone was really lovely at Dorsett, especially Yadi. He‚Äôs been great help and has a fantastic humour. Thanks Yadi! The hotel is located in a strategic location with fantastic bars and places nearby. The rooms are clean and the bed is comfortable. The only downside is the hotel breakfast which I find frankly, quite embarrassing for a 4 star hotel. I don‚Äôt expect processed cheeses and such a small selection of breakfast.

title: Great service and friendly staff
desc: Friendly staff "Jason" that fast responding for my needs, that my room access can't turn on the lights. Very fast responding from the technician and the cleaner that help out with my access card. Definitely will return back to this hotel for my stay.

title: Very impressive!
desc: I'd stayed at Dorsett Singapore in Jan 2020. On the second day before went out in the morning, I noticed that one of my earring back which put nearby the wash basin at night was disappeared. I spent a long time searching for it and very worried since it's my most favourite one. Finally, still couldn't. I'm sure that nobody came into my room before that. I told the officers at the front desk, let them take photo of the remaining earrings, and asked them to recheck for me before leaving. In the evening, Mr. Oonah Taylor together with security officer (s) were the ones who could find and returned it to me in original condition. I didn't see her on check-out date; anyway, would like to thank her and the team very much for the adorable patience, great kindness, and impressive service

title: Not 4 star!
desc: Stayed here for 3 nights with my husband while exploring the city. This hotel is no way a 4 star. The reception looks like it is while the rooms tell a very different story. They are old and dated with a musty smell. More like a cheap 3 star. Also had a bad experience with a dirty towel being left in our room with a dirty plaster on it. When we went down to tell reception and ask them for new towels they didn‚Äôt seem bothered at all and got no apology. When we returned we had new towels but they hadn‚Äôt taken the dirty ones away. Customer service at reception wasn‚Äôt great. There was a lovely lady who served the breakfast who was very friendly and always offered advice on things to do and see. Have to say the only plus for this hotel is the location but we wouldn‚Äôt stay again.

title: Great service and strategic location
desc: Stayed 2 nights in a deluxe double room and this is our 2nd visit. The service is very good, rooms are clean but feels dated (esp the carpets). The bathrooms are quite narrow though. 8.5/10 for room cleanliness. 10/10 in terms location, Outram MRT is literally a stone's throw away and very close to USS, Orchard Road and even Marina Bay Sands. Yadi, the duty manager was very courteous and went the extra mile to make sure all our needs were addressed. Will stay here again.

title: An excellent trip!
desc: It‚Äôs a beautiful hotel, and the service is perfect. Here‚Äôs a special thank to Mrs Guan & Mr Suntar, for they helped us a lot to enjoy this trip. ÈÖíÂ∫óË∑ùÁ¶ªÁâõËΩ¶Ê∞¥ÂæàËøëÔºåÊ≠•Ë°åÊï∞ÂàÜÈíüÂèØÂà∞ÔºåÂà∞Â§ÑÈÉΩÊòØ‰∏≠ÂçéÁæéÈ£üÔºõÈôÑËøëÊúâ‰∏ÄÊù°Ë°óÈÅì‰∏äËøòÊúâÂæàÂ§öÁ≤æËá¥ÁöÑÈÖíÂêßÔºåÂÖÖÊª°ÂºÇÂüüÈ£éÊÉÖ„ÄÇ‰ªéÈÖíÂ∫óÂá∫ÂèëÂéªÈáëËûç‰∏≠ÂøÉ„ÄÅÈáëÊ≤ô„ÄÅÈ±ºÂ∞æÁãÆÂÖ¨Âõ≠‰πüÂæàËøëÔºåÂèØ‰ª•ËØ¥ÊòØÂõõÈÄöÂÖ´Ëææ‰∫Ü„ÄÇ ÂÆ¢ÊàøÊúçÂä°ÂæàË¥¥ÂøÉÔºåÊàøÈó¥Âπ≤ÂáÄÊï¥Ê¥ÅÔºå‰∏çËøáÈÖíÂ∫óÊ•ºÂ±Ç‰∏çÊòØÂæàÈ´òÔºåËøôÂèØËÉΩÊòØÊØîËæÉÈÅóÊÜæÁöÑÂú∞Êñπ„ÄÇÊÄªËÄåË®Ä‰πãÊòØ‰∏ÄÂú∫ÂæàÊ£íÁöÑ‰ΩìÈ™åÔºÅ

title: Great location
desc: Fantastic location if you want to enjoy Singapore. Walking distance to the Chinatown or 1 train stop away! The old house around the hotel has been recently refurbished into a boutique hotels, quirky bars, boutique brewery and elegant restaurants. Hotel itself is quirky and modern. Room was clean but the lay out is not really my style. Staff are friendly and helpful. overall very good hotel to stay.

title: Great service from a friendly manager
desc: I went to Dorsett Singapore to view some rooms for my family who were visiting Singapore in December. I was greeted by Mr.Yadi, the manager of the hotel. Although I was just there for viewing and had not booked any rooms, he patiently answered all my queries and doubts, and gave me a small tour of the hotel and briefed me on the facilities. The entire time he was friendly, welcoming, and cracked some jokes! The staff are friendly, especially the manager. Would recommend this hotel!

title: Don't trust the reviews - Not 4 star - overpriced dirty hotel
desc: Recently stayed here for work for the first time based on the 4 star reviews on TripAdvisor. Never again. This is not a 4 star hotel, at best a poorly maintained 3 star hotel and overpriced. Pay $20 more and stay at the Swisotel Merchant Court which is a totally different experience. Basically: - Rooms very old, unclean and run down - Scratch and dirt marks everywhere, closet was falling apart, no bath, the shower was leaking, luckily I only went back to the hotel to sleep at night as I could not even work at the desk in the room which had no amenities whatsoever and was dark and cramped - There is only 1 place to eat on the ground floor and it was terrible. Do NOT pay for the breakfast, the food is not edible and shocking - basics that are very hard to get wrong like bread and

title: Dirty and old!
desc: this hotel is rundown and dirty, the room has marks and scratches all over the furniture. The shower had little insects walking around and the towels had frays all over them. Upon checkout we sat in the lobby for a while until the heat was unbearable, I asked the hotel staff if they could change the aircon seatings, they just said no...

title: Enjoyable Stay
desc: We have returned to this hotel to stay for a few days. The location is near to the hospital, Outram Park station, and Chinatown. Everything is within reach. The staff are amazing and can recall their return guests. Always greeted by Michelle, Jason, May, to name a few at the reception. Thank you for looking after us. We will definitely come back here to stay for our next doctor appointments.

title: Clean, Nice location, good service.
desc: Overall a nice stay with just nice and cozy room. Most things are clean... just few parts can see the wear and tear started to take place... but its ok... things are good here. Manage to get the free drink session (lounge access)... but there is no snack provided.. just wine and instant coffee... not even a coffee machine.. so.. to save some money.. this can be skipped. Staff are great and friendly. Very near to MRT.... convenient !

title: Exercise stay
desc: We are the regular here because we are here to visit SGH. The team has been very nice and also took care of us, me and my wife. Front desk Michelle and May always recognize us and gave us the warm welcome. Always good to be back

title: Hotel at strategic location
desc: I was here for a 2-night stay for work. I would like to express my sincere thanks to the front desk team, especially Michelle and Rachel, for providing an excellent service. Michelle and Rachel recommended me a few fantastic restaurants nearby the hotel for dinner, and they also offered to book the restaurants for us. The restaurants turned out to be so great that everyone in my group enjoyed the dinner very much. We couldn't have found those restaurants without their help.

title: Feels like Home
desc: They have the warmest & caring people. Special thanks to Michelle and Jackie for making our stay a memorable one ‚ò∫Ô∏è The food over at Amuse was really really great and the staff were always caring for our needs ‚ò∫Ô∏è

title: Super 6*+ Location with Room for Improvement In House Keeping
desc: A 4* hotel with a 6*+ greatest location just above the subway station (one could take the subway all the way from the airport to the hotel at the cost of S$2.60 per ride), with ample great fine dining and more casual restaurants in the nearby very safe area (with the police headquarter right next door) within walking distance (ranging from one minute to 20 minutes), although the hotel itself is not quite 4* (at most 3.5* and more like 3*) in terms of ambiance. The shower area in a very small and crowded washroom needs an upgrade, the cleanliness of which definitely has room for improvement (black mouldy marks between the tiles in the shower and the metallic door hinges were rusty already)

title: Next To MRT
desc: Small yet comfortable. Located above the Outram MRT Station and also have a Craft Beer shop opposite the entrance of the Hotel. If you need to go to the airport, just go downstairs and its only 1 train change to Changi. It is also opposite to the General hospital. and its 15 min away to Sentosa Island.

title: Enjoyed our stay, great location
desc: Stayed here for 5 nights on our recent stay in Singapore. Location was handy at Outram MRT Station. Chinatown was an easy 7 minute walk away. Lots of markets, places to eat and another MRT Station. The hotel had a lovely outdoor pool. We didn't try the restaurant so can't comment there. Check in and check out was friendly and quick. The room was clean and lovely. Taxi from airport was about S$25. Would stay here again if I go back to Singapore.

title: Great location and approach to Chinatown
desc: The hotel might take great part of your travel, if you prefer staying in hotel during trip. I don't use hotel every time I travel, but actually satisfied with Dorsett. With cozy sofas at some places there, i enjoyed them, and if you are everyday-excerciser, this hotel is well recommended as it have clean swimming pool and fitness place. The room was great, and thought that was enough, or more better than I expect to the hotels I will stay. Lobby was so not that big, but it is a kind of place seems luxurious. This hotel have great location. Almost at the place the hotel is, you can get subway at Outram Station, or Singapore Chinatown is not that far from the hotel. So when you are bored at early night, you can go out and have some food and souveniers there, or hang out with

title: Very Good
desc: We really enjoyed our stay here. The location was great, being right next to China town. It‚Äôs easy to get to anywhere within the city, for a cheap cab fair. We stayed in a loft room, which was rather small and poky but, lovely just the same. We would definitely stay here again.

title: Excellent location
desc: The hotel is strategically located near Chinatown. Outram Park is next to it (5 min walk) and Chinatown is about 8 mins walk away. There is also a bus stop nearby. It is clean, and has basic amenities. I will stay here again.

title: Nice hotel & good location
desc: I visited Singapor on a business trip in January'19. Spent a week at this hotel and had a nice experience. Clean and nice rooms. Good service and breakfast. Wifi at rooms works well and is OK for business purposes. Excellent location to reach public transport and visit Chinatown.

title: Great short stay
desc: Stayed at the Dorsett while relocating from Australia to Singapore. The upgrade to a bigger room was appreciated with our extra luggage. Staff were exceptional; from our arrival when 2 concierge appeared to help with luggage, easy and swift check in with Siri, the very friendly and helpful lady running breakfast to the fantastic person I met in the elevator who filled up our water bottles. We will definitely recommend to friends & family visiting based on service, room size and facilities.

title: Poor value for the cost.
desc: As a senior traveler, I stayed at the Dorsett with my wife for three nights in October 2019. Cost was $A920.00 and we expected something of quality. 1. Room 426 was continually warm, the air-conditioning unable to cope. 2. The room safe did not work and required an attendant to fix it. 3. Carpets were grubby with stains. Looked like it needed a decent vacuum. 4. Towels were threadbare. 5. Check in was managed by a female staff member with a heavy cold who snorted back flem constantly. 6. Tea making kettle seemed to drip water. 7. One power point was not working. 8. Only a single small chair in the room. 9. Swimming pool was off limits. 10. Breakfast alright and staff very helpful. Restaurant for evening dining very poor and incompetent. 11. It seemed

title: Value for money
desc: For Singapore standard, room is spacious enough. Bed is comfortable and clean. Bathroom also in proper size. Location is strategic near mrt and bus stop, you can easily go to Clarke/orchard/sentosa. If you want to explore Singapore tourist area, this hotel is perfect to rest.

title: Surprised with how amazing the service is
desc: I've stayed many times in Singapore and for the price you pay, this hotel is great value. Upon checking in, Yadi, the hotel manager (if I remember correctly) was extremely pleasant and helpful, going above and beyond what I would normally expect. I was very impressed with early check-in and him providing an umbrella because I was rushing to a meeting while it was raining heavily. The staff was the highlight of my stay.

title: Satisfied ad Eventful Stay
desc: Hotel is well positioned In city area which is easily accessible to public transport, shopping malls and many/various F & B outlets.
